name: Jaspr
description: A modern web framework for building websites in Dart with support for both client-side and server-side rendering.

params.name: Template
params.description: The template used to generate this new project.

options.basic: (Recommended) A basic pure-dart web app with ssr & automatic client hydration.
options.classic: A classic web app using separate html, css and dart files with ssr & manual client hydration.
options.client: A pure client-side app without ssr.
options.server: A purely server-side rendered app without client hydration.
